 2010-07692010-06-17,  HRSD,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Loans Act
Canada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations and the Canada Student Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS AND THE CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to implement changes to the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act (CSFAA) and the Canada Student Loans Act (CSLA) adopted in the Budget Implementation Act, 2009, which received Royal Assent on March 12, 2009.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0144 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
